title: Afrooz Razi
text:
Welcome!
My name is Afrooz Razi and I ma Ph.D. candidate at the school of Medicine at Johns Hopkins.


Research background:
I got my B.S. degree in Cell Biology and Molecular Genetics at the University of Maryland, College Park in 2018. After graduation, I worked as a lab technician at Dr. Kevin S. McIver’s lab. Upon my matriculation in the Human Genetics and Genomics Ph.D. program in 2020, I became very interested in the genomics research and joined Dr. Kasper D. Hansen’s lab.


Involvement

Co-organizer of R-Ladies Baltimore
Volunteer at Bioconductor conference 2023
